en onions. That is all.

te:

>

>
> And the curlicues are chopped =
green onions?
>
> At first those small curved figures looked like the usual=
 
> representation of birds, but they aren't that.=A0 The two at the right =

> as is the upper end of the main "noodle."=A0 Strange one.
